text: Zudaiŋ Kaiafas phena thav, Zisas ndigap Zudia ŋgu bakɨme fhaiŋ gari guman pan Pairat phenan vui. Mbe mɨn goravra thagim, mbe ana ndiga vui. Mbe khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, “Nza muuŋv kɨv, Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgip, nza Pasova tuga bakɨmen pi mba mbegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara.” Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe ŋgu bakɨme fhaiŋ gari guman pana phena vhen vergi fhuvara.
